txt.en:
'You've been a big help to me, [placeholder]. Something about you tells me you could be a great help to many. If you are looking to further your charitable nature, you may want to speak with Second-watcher Heathstraw in Bree-town.

'Heathstraw is very much in the know of problems facing Bree. What with the refugees coming from the south and all the whispers of the rising dark, I think he's got a fair share of details to keep track of, poor fellow.

'You can find him through the Staddle-gate of Bree standing near the Boar Fountain in the Market Square.'

'Lolo? Used to come here often, he did. Good stout little fellow, good barker and good seller he is. Strange for a hobbit it's true, but then again they say that most hobbits living 'round here is queer.

'His information is correct though, Bree's seen its share of new blood recently, and not all have been of your quality.

'If you need work, I am certain that I can find you something.'

Lolo Wendingway mentioned that Bree-town is a-flutter with rumours of shadows growing and refugees pouring in from the south. He told you to seek out Second-watcher Heathstraw if you were looking to continue your assistance of Bree-land.

Second-watcher Heathstraw can be found near the Boar Fountain in the centre of the Market Square in Bree-town.\n\nLolo Wendingway mentioned that Second-watcher Heathstraw may have some knowledge of people needing things done throughout Bree.
